content: the edgewater tank top crochet pattern is full of texture and fun this easy to make crochet top is worked from the bottom up with a beautiful scoop neckline and lots of coverage so pesky bra straps don t show **as of july 2023 this pattern has been updated ** what s included * 4 page written pattern in pdf format * link to video stitch tutorial * instructions for women s sizes xs to 5x pattern difficulty intermediate yarn wecrochet comfy worsted #4 1 sizes xs- 30 bust- 566 yards s- 34 bust - 636 yards m- 38 bust - 707 yards l- 42 bust - 778 yards xl- 46 bust - 848 yards 2x- 50 bust - 919 yards 3x 54 bust - 990 yards 4x 58 bust - 1060 yards 5x 62 bust - 1131 yards all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns once they have been downloaded however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns **new to crocheting garments or need some extra help with them sign up for the free ultimate guide to crocheting garments email series ** 2 you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make *this listing contains affiliate links * 1 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=1435385&u=1361772&m=59159&urllink=&afftrack= 2 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
